ItemTooltips.gauntlets: You will Upgrade it later into an Urn
ItemTooltips.branches: You will upgrade these 3 Into an Magic Wand
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: You will use these for important low amount regenerations when enemies uses spells around you
ItemTooltips.bottle: The Most important Item,It's your best Regeneration item
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Helpful for Travelling across the map
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Used to heal you For 400 HP,or finish of enemies below 150 Hp,1 Kill = 2 Charges
ItemTooltips.force_staff: since you're a really really  bad escaper,You get this item for its mana + and it's push for hooking and escaping
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: When you have this,you're almost unstoppable since you heal when you ult, and do extra damage.
ItemTooltips.heart: Got this item? GG WP. the match is over ;)
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: This item is also a GG WP item.
ItemTooltips.hood_of_defiance: Since your rot Damages you also,this will increase your magic resistance and make you take less damage from rot
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Most people love Phase,But this is better,it fixes your mana pool problem,you usually have 1 hook+ 1 ult with phase,this gives you enough mana for more more hooks and ults

AbilityTooltips.pudge_meat_hook: Yar meat hook,land one and it's the end
AbilityTooltips.pudge_rot: Your fart the kills everyone,must use after hook and with dismember
AbilityTooltips.pudge_flesh_heap: Well give you magic resistance,and more strength for each kill
AbilityTooltips.pudge_dismember: Your Face-Eating Move,It's a killer machine,just try to avoid being silenced or stunned
